entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 1:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
